name: SPG Awards 2018-2020 Yearbook
description:
The Most Prestigious Awards Ceremony Of All Time

For the past 2 years, The Sandy Pug Game Awards have upended the wild world of tabletop RPG award events. An award that anyone, even the indies, can win, the SPG awards are a phenomenon, celebrating the coolest, chilliest, most inventive, and creative people in the indie TTRPG scene. The awards take place over twitter, roughly twice a year, and invite everyone to nominate themselves, their friends, and their games for an award of their choosing, and, assuming Liam isn't asleep or eating or w/e, everyone's a guaranteed winner.
